Form.err_password>8: password must be at least 8 characters
Form.err_password<32: password must be no more than 32 characters
Form.err_passwordContainUpper: password must contain at least one uppercase letter
Form.err_passwordContainLower: password must contain at least one lowercase letter
Form.err_passwordContainNum: password must contain at least one number
Form.err_passwordContainSpecChar: password must contain at least one special character

Errors.auth/email-already-in-use: This email is already associated with an account
Errors.auth/too-many-requests: Too many requests. Please try again later
Errors.auth/user-disabled: This user account has been disabled by an administrator
Errors.auth/account-exists-with-different-crede: An account already exists with a different sign-in method
Errors.auth/cancelled-popup-request: The sign-in process was cancelled. Please try again
Errors.auth/popup-closed-by-user: The sign-in popup was closed. Please try again.
